duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in preparing pipe for assembly and operate various equipment such as cut-off saw, drill press, and belt sander.
Learn to set up and operate all Victaulic grooving tools, clean, and maintain as needed.
Assist in testing such as hydrostatic, flex, bending moment, air, low temperature, and heat aging to comply with engineering specifications.
Maintain various lab equipment as assigned and records/logs; prepare charts and graphs.
Support continuous improvement developments in the lab in accordance with Lean and Safety Initiatives.
Perform inventory control of lab raw materials and maintain a clean work area in the lab environment.
Follow all company safety requirements, procedures and participate in testing safety reviews.
Log and estimate all hours using Liquid Planner (LP) and use LP as a primary communication tool.
Understand and follow departmental policies and procedures for document management and electronic data security.
